settings.title: Why is the service not working after refill?
settings.content:
After renewal, the SIM card will resume service in several minutes, if not, please restart the device.

To avoid the service interruptions, suggestion you REFILL your data plan before your current plan expires

settings.title: I recharge the wrong ICCID number, how to solve it?
settings.content: If you enter the wrong ICCID number, the payment won't recharge the payment successfully. If the payment was recharged, please contact us.

settings.title: The payment is rejected, but the card is no problem, how do I recharge?
settings.content:
We accept below payment methods

• American Express

• China UnionPay (CUP)

• Discover & Diners

• Japan Credit Bureau (JCB)

• Mastercard

• Visa

•paypal

Change your email address and change your payment card. Try a different payment method from the list of accepted payment methods,If you're still having issues,contact us.

settings.title: Steps for Enabling Automatic Renewal
settings.content:
Step1: click https://sim.eiotclub.com/eshop/

Step 2: Enter SIM card ICCID number

Step 3: Choose the plan you want

Step 4: check the “Automatic renewal”

settings.title: Steps for cancelling Automatic Renewal
settings.content:
Step 1: Visit: https://sim.eiotclub.com/eshop

Step 2: Enter SIM card ICCID number

Step 3: tap "orders" on the bottom

Step 4: toggle off the "Renewal"

settings.title: Quick refill service
settings.content:
Use EIOTCLUB quick refill service to replenish your account with a plan or add data.

You can also check your balance, see when your plan is set to expire, and more by logging in online to your EIOTCLUB account.
settings.step01: Step 1: Enter you correct ICCID in our rehcarge platform.
settings.step02: Step 2: Check the status of yourcard/package expiry time/traffic usage.
settings.step04: Step 4: No auto recharge monthly, choose the data plan as you needed.
